## Cascading combo box {.t2}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/cascading_combox.mp4){fig-align="center"}
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

- **Combo box.** Answers entered by typing text and selecting most appropriate option.

:::
